Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Door latch mechanism failure to engage. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Landing Gear component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 14/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer
